Key Match Events: Di Maria scored the winning goal with a toe-poke from a tight angle after 40 minutes.
Pre-Game Insights: Lionel Messi did not start the game and was substituted after 60 minutes.
Post-Match Reflections: Lionel Scaloni's side relied on their defensive acumen to secure the win.
Lautaro Martinez was ineffective throughout the match.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Emi Martinez was relatively untroubled throughout the game.
Gonzalo Montiel held his position defensively without venturing forward.
